input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector (iPad Mini 4 2015 Version)

Item keywords:
Tempered Glass Screen Protector Fits Perfectly for the New Apple iPad Mini 4
Smooth and Touch Sensitive Glass Surface. No Air Bubble Application
Anti Shatter Glass, Ultra Thin and Tough, Real Premium Tempered Glass with anti chip 9H Hardness
Protects your iPad Mini 4 and Prevents LCD Scratches
HD Clear and Anti-fingerprint Anti Smudge oleophobic coating
Feels like the glass you are used to on your phone
Slim design doesn't add unnecessary bulk

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Introducing the Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector. This is the ultimate protection for your new iPad Mini 4 2015 Version. This tempered glass screen protector is designed to fit perfectly and protect your device from scratches, dust, and dirt. It's made with real premium tempered glass with an anti-chip 9H hardness and an anti-fingerprint and anti-smudge oleophobic coating. This screen protector is also smooth and touch-sensitive, so you can feel like you're using your iPad Mini 4 as if there were no screen protector at all. Plus, it's ultra-thin and doesn't add any unnecessary bulk to your device. Don't let the risk of damage to your new iPad Mini 4 ruin the experience.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
